landing.bio: I am a Frontend Developer who works in CatalystOne

experience.aboutWork: Responsible for building frontend projects using microservices architecture
Responsible for building a UI component library that is being used internally in other projects

education.university: Beant College of Engineering and Technology

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
